title: Procurement of 20 Container Carrier Wagons and 30 Fuel Tank Wagons for the Department of Sri Lanka Railways
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to award the contract for the supply of 20 Container Carrier Wagons and 30 Fuel Tank Wagons for the Department of Sri Lanka Railways under the Indian Line of Credit, in accordance with the recommendation of the Cabinet Appointed Negotiation Committee (CANC), was approved by the Cabinet.
